mapper.insert: insert into journal(content, title_name, creator_id, create_time, type_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{titleName}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{typeId})
mapper.select: select j.id id, title_name, p.user_name creator, create_time, type_name from journal j, user u, user_profile p, journal_type t where j.creator_id = #{id} and u.id = j.creator_id and p.id = u.profile_id and t.id = j.type_id
